Title: Relates to transferring credits from a CUNY community college to a New York state university
Summary: Relates to allowing CUNY community college students to transfer all earned credits to a New York state university.
LawCode: Amd ยง6303, add ยง208-b, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to transferring credits from a CUNY community college to a New York state university
